i have nothing to do so i think i'll write a proper journal entry for once.

dear journal,

ummm

jennie is a sweet<3
"for real"
she so gets stuff
like why i hate feminists. and why i'm a femmenist.
and how stupid people can be
and she feels stuff the way i do.

what is ~stufF~
?
iunno i suppose stuff is just trivial nonsense that you can judge (maybe?) somebody by how they react to it?




i think i'm ~thisclose~ to actually realising something. i hope.



guy...hmmm...
i'm not sad. or mad. haha. people think i should be mad.
at her? at him?
ummmmmm
i wish i could?
since it will probably end up nasty...that's what happens.
i know i can't say anything to her....without her taking it the wrong way...i don't even want her to get hurt. not by that jerk.
if she stays ~with~ him...maybe it will work out. and if it does then he should have been with her. happy ending. and whatever i had with him was just to lead him to her.
isn't that detatched? i suppose i just expected it
maybe since i expected it i created it?

i don't know
i thought he liked me
shit i thought he understood me
but
he had a one track mind stuck on repeat and i don't like that kind of music anyway

like i have nothing else to give?

one two three repeater
repeater
one two three
repeater

(you wonder what i do...none of your fucking business)

i think i should be celibate
until i'm 21
maybe
i just don't want to confuse myself any more

not like that
i'm sure i'm just looking for too much
and im sure being a stupid dork isn't the most attractive thing

i was this blonde pale chick in this house and i was delerious. and my sister was there and she was this brunette pale chick. and we had the same haircut and facial features so i think we were twins.  she came to stay with me to take care of me because i was having these fits and i was in the house because it was some sort of hospice. and then i (the blonde) went into this fitful sleep and woke up as the brunette in the middle of the night. and i tried to sleep but i couldn't. so i went into the hallway and saw a light in the closet. and when i went into the closet the doctor was there frantically going through all these boxes of pills. i just saw him from the back which was his long blond hair and doctor's coat. and i stood there watching him and then he turned around and he had this wolf face and he started laughing like an evil maniac and he threw a box of pills at me. so i ran away back to my room and sat on this homemade bedcover and waited for him to come in but i woke up before he did.

i will find out tomorrow if the dream had any significance.

and then i had this other dream where there were aliens who came to earth and i think i worked for the un or something so they sent me to like make peace with them? and when i went on the spaceship it just took off and they didn't understand my language so i just pointed out the window and then they took me into this room with a bed so i could sleep. and i woke up and somehow realised i was pregnant. and the baby developed really quickly and i was about to give birth. but the aliens were all guy aliens and then these girl aliens came to try to take me to their colony. because they were the same aliens only they hated each other and always went to war to kill each other if they came into contact with each other. and i telepathically found out that they only reproduce by cloning.  so i was pregnant massive and about to give birth and none of the aliens knew how to deliver a baby because they never did it before. they just kept arguing and being violent in the delivery room. so i was screaming and praying and stuff delivering this baby and thinking i was going to die and then i woke up.

what the fuck

dream in wintertime

all winter we'll wander in a red wagon
with cushions of blue
nice and warm. with a nest of creepy kisses
just for us two.

you shut your eyes and won't look out the window
where shadows lurk:
hordes of black wolves and black demons and nightmares
inhabit the dark.

and then in a panic suddenly you feel
a little kiss, like a scared spider, crawl
across your cheek...

you turn to me to help you find the beast,
and of course i promise to do my best,
if it takes all week...


arthur rimbaud

i had a dream where my hair was exactly like this and i was wearing a long white dress...
You are one of the few out there whose wings are
truly ANGELIC. Selfless, powerful, and
divine, you are one blessed with a certain
cosmic grace. You are unequalled in
peacefulness, love, and beauty. As a Being of
Light your wings are massive and a soft white
or silver. Countless feathers grace them and
radiate the light within you for all the world
to see. You are a defender, protector, and
caretaker. Comforter of the weak and forgiver
of the wrong, chances are you are taken
advantage of once in awhile, maybe quite often.
But your innocence and wisdom sees the good in
everyone and so this mistreatment does not make
you colder. Merciful to the extreme, you will
try to help misguided souls find themselves and
peace. However not all Angelics allow
themselves to be gotten the better of - the
Seraphim for example will be driven to fighting
for the sake of Justice and protection of those
less powerful. Congratulations - and don't ever
change - the world needs more people like you.

*~*~*Claim Your Wings - Pics and Long Answers*~*~*
brought to you by Quizilla

Your soul is bound to the Solitary Rose: The
Alone. "When I wake up alone, the shades are still
drawn on the cold window pane so they cast
their lines on my bed and lines on my
face." The Solitary Rose is associated with loneliness,
melancholy, and patience. It is governed by
the goddess Merope and its sign is The Sword,
or Unrequited Love. As a Solitary Rose, you may be summed up as a
hopeless romantic. You desire love and have so
much love to give, but thing just never seem to
work out the way you want them to. In life,
you can be very optomistic, even when things
are gray and nothing works out to your
expectations.

What Rose Is Your Soul Bound To?
brought to you by Quizilla

You are Form 1, Goddess: The Creator. "And The Goddess planted the acorn of life.
She cried a single tear and shed a single drop
of blood upon the earth where she buried it.
From her blood and tear, the acorn grew into
the world." Some examples of the Goddess Form are Gaia (Greek),
Jehova (Christian), and Brahma (Indian). The Goddess is associated with the concept of
creation, the number 1, and the element of
earth. Her sign is the dawn sun. As a member of Form 1, you are a charismatic
individual and people are drawn to you.
Although sometimes you may seem emotionally
distant, you are deeply in tune with other
people's feelings and have tremendous empathy.
Sometimes you have a tendency to neglect your
own self. Goddesses are the best friends to
have because they're always willing to help.

Which Mythological Form Are You?
brought to you by Quizilla

how to make some straight ramen

1. put water in a tea kettle until it whistles
2. put package of ramen in frying pan and pour tea water over it
3. separate ramen and cook until soft
4. drain 95% of water from pan
5. continue to cook ramen and add seasoning packet
6. when most of water has evaporated, add virgin olive oil, mushrooms and shrimp to ramen. or whatever else you want in the ramen. that was all i had to add.
7. continue to cook ramen.
